dcterms:creator: K. Aoki
T. Nakajima
K. Nikolov
dcterms:description: This dataset explores the relationship between safe asset shortages and asset price bubbles.
dcterms:title: Safe asset shortages and asset price bubbles

dcterms:creator: F. Black
dcterms:description: This dataset presents a model of capital market equilibrium in the absence of a riskless asset.
dcterms:title: Capital market equilibrium with restricted borrowing

dcterms:creator: R. J. Caballero
E. Farhi
dcterms:description: This dataset models the Safe Asset Mechanism (SAM) and discusses safety traps and economic policy.
dcterms:title: A Model of the Safe Asset Mechanism (SAM): Safety Traps and Economic Policy

dcterms:creator: Y. Davydov
V. Rotar
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses a non-classical invariance principle in statistics.
dcterms:title: On a non-classical invariance principle

dcterms:creator: D. Duffie
dcterms:description: This dataset provides a comprehensive theory of dynamic asset pricing.
dcterms:title: Dynamic Asset Pricing Theory

dcterms:creator: G. B. Eggertsson
P. Krugman
dcterms:description: This dataset analyzes debt, deleveraging, and the liquidity trap using a Fisher-Minsky-Koo approach.
dcterms:title: Debt, deleveraging, and the liquidity trap: A Fisher-Minsky-Koo approach

dcterms:creator: P. Fisher
dcterms:description: This dataset reflects on the concept of 'risk-free' in the context of sovereign risk.
dcterms:title: Reflections on the meaning of 'risk free'

dcterms:creator: P.-O. Gourinchas
O. Jeanne
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses the concept of global safe assets.
dcterms:title: Global safe assets

dcterms:creator: Y. Hu
A. Shirvani
W. B. Lindquist
F. J. Fabozzi
S. T. Rachev
dcterms:description: This dataset presents a method for option pricing that incorporates factor dynamics in complete markets.
dcterms:title: Option pricing incorporating factor dynamics in complete markets

dcterms:creator: Y. Hu
A. Shirvani
S. Stoyanov
Y. S. Kim
F. J. Fabozzi
S. T. Rachev
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses option pricing in markets with informed traders.
dcterms:title: Option pricing in markets with informed traders

dcterms:creator: Y. Hu
W. B. Lindquist
S. T. Rachev
F. J. Fabozzi
dcterms:description: This dataset presents a method for option pricing using a skew random walk pricing tree.
dcterms:title: Option pricing using a skew random walk pricing tree

dcterms:creator: J. C. Hull
dcterms:description: This dataset provides a comprehensive overview of options, futures, and other derivatives.
dcterms:title: Options, Futures and Other Derivatives

dcterms:creator: R. A. Jarrow
P. Protter
H. Sayit
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses the conditions for no arbitrage in financial markets.
dcterms:title: No arbitrage without semimartingales

dcterms:creator: Y. S. Kim
S. Stoyanov
S. T. Rachev
F. J. Fabozzi
dcterms:description: This dataset presents a multi-purpose binomial model that fits all moments to the underlying geometric Brownian motion.
dcterms:title: Multi-purpose binomial model: Fitting all moments to the underlying geometric Brownian motion

dcterms:creator: H. Konno
H. Shirakawa
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses the existence of a nonnegative equilibrium price vector in the mean-variance capital market.
dcterms:title: Existence of a nonnegative equilibrium price vector in the mean-variance capital market

dcterms:creator: L. T. Nielsen
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses equilibrium in the Capital Asset Pricing Model (CAPM) without a riskless asset.
dcterms:title: Equilibrium in CAPM without a riskless asset

dcterms:creator: S. T. Rachev
S. Stoyanov
F. J. Fabozzi
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses financial markets that do not have a riskless (safe) asset.
dcterms:title: Financial markets with no riskless (safe) asset

dcterms:creator: S. E. Shreve
dcterms:description: This dataset provides a comprehensive introduction to stochastic calculus for finance, focusing on the binomial asset pricing model.
dcterms:title: Stochastic Calculus for Finance I, The Binomial Asset Pricing Model

dcterms:creator: N. Sun
Z. Yang
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses the existence of equilibrium and zero-beta pricing formula in the capital asset pricing model with heterogeneous beliefs.
dcterms:title: Existence of equilibrium and zero-beta pricing formula in the capital asset pricing model with heterogeneous beliefs

dcterms:creator: R. Sundaram
S. Das
dcterms:description: This dataset provides principles and practices related to derivatives.
dcterms:title: Derivatives: Principles and Practice
